subtitle: Full-stack engineer with deep expertise in Next.js, Nest.js, and AWS, delivering scalable, reliable, and AI-ready digital products.
metricsSubtitle: Quantified outcomes from delivery, optimization, operations, and AI-enabled automation.

metricsData.label: Faster defect resolution
metricsData.detail: Improved triage, diagnostics, and test coverage, with AI-assisted automation.

metricsData.label: Product surfaces delivered
metricsData.detail: Kiosk, mobile, web, and admin releases aligned to one roadmap.

metricsData.label: End-to-end delivery
metricsData.detail: From platform APIs to production-grade UI.

caseStudiesSubtitle: Selected engagements with explicit problem definition, solution, outcomes, and AI integration.

caseStudiesData.title: Kiosk Payment Integration
caseStudiesData.problem: Payment flows were inconsistent across devices and connection states.
caseStudiesData.solution: Delivered a C#/.NET HTTP plugin, hardened JS↔C# bindings, and implemented fallback handling.
caseStudiesData.result: Stabilized /Auth and /Cancel flows with resilient device orchestration.

caseStudiesData.title: QR/Barcode Scanner Connectivity
caseStudiesData.problem: Scanner data loss and inconsistent parsing in kiosk environments.
caseStudiesData.solution: Implemented RS232 parsing, validation, and asynchronous UI synchronization.
caseStudiesData.result: Improved scan accuracy and response feedback consistency.

caseStudiesData.title: Real-time Platform Features
caseStudiesData.problem: High-traffic collaboration required reliable real-time messaging.
caseStudiesData.solution: Implemented WebSocket messaging with Bull Queue and Redis session sharing.
caseStudiesData.result: Sustained 1:N group chat with stable session continuity.

caseStudiesData.title: Waiting System Modernization
caseStudiesData.problem: Peak-time traffic caused inconsistent ordering and operational recovery issues.
caseStudiesData.solution: Implemented Redis atomicity with DB synchronization, session scopes, and fallback recovery flows.
caseStudiesData.result: Delivered consistent sequencing, duplicate-prevention, and reliable recovery under load.

caseStudiesData.title: Settlement Statement Site
caseStudiesData.problem: Manual settlement documentation created operational delays and inconsistencies.
caseStudiesData.solution: Built an AI-assisted internal settlement site with standardized workflows and deployment automation.
caseStudiesData.result: Improved turnaround time and reduced manual reconciliation effort.

skillsSubtitle: Balanced strengths across product engineering, systems design, delivery, and AI integration.
summaryHighlights: Full-stack delivery across web, mobile, kiosk, and admin products.
Proven experience in platform design, real-time systems, and integrations.
Emphasis on reliable delivery, UX quality, and maintainable code.
Actively leverage AI to improve efficiency and quality.
resumeHeadline: In the era of AI agents, I am growing into a product-minded web developer who delivers user-journey-driven design, operable systems, safe AI integration, and robust security and access control.
resumeGoalLines: I am learning and applying product design centered on user journeys and success metrics beyond feature delivery.
Across operational domains such as waiting, settlement, and payment, I have stabilized systems with concurrency, consistency, and transactional integrity while strengthening operations practice.
I am expanding the capability to integrate LLMs safely via RAG, tool calling, guardrails, evals, and cost optimization, not just API calls.
Long term, I aim to solve business problems rapidly through domain expertise and compliance-ready security, access control, and audit logging.
resumeGrowthBullets: Product design: user-journey and success-metric-driven planning (signup → payment → retention).
Systems/performance/data: cache, queue, async, transactions, consistency, and concurrency control (locks/idempotency).
Operations/observability: CI/CD, monitoring, alerts, and log-driven incident response.
AI integration: validating RAG, tool calling, guardrails, evals, and cost optimization in production-like work.
Security/compliance: least privilege, access control, data masking, and audit logging.
Domain expertise: rapidly understanding industry problems and solving them.
resumeRoadmapBullets: Implementing idempotency, transactional integrity, and operational logging/alerts in a payment and webhook ecommerce project.
Applying FAQ auto-updates (RAG), policy filters (guardrails), and quality evals to customer support automation.
Designing and testing AI cost optimization via caching, model selection, and cost controls.
resumeInterviewLine: As AI accelerates code creation, I will differentiate through user-journey product design, operable systems, security, and safe AI integration.

items: Full-stack Web Developer with hands-on experience in AWS CI/CD, Dockerized deployments, and scalable architectures using Next.js and NestJS.

experienceSubtitle: Roles, scope, impact, and AI application across products and platforms.
chatbotSubtitle: Ask about experience, stack, projects, outcomes, or AI usage.
chatbotGreeting: Hello. I can answer questions about experience, skills, projects, and outcomes.
chatbotFallback: Please provide more context—e.g., experience, projects, tech stack, or outcomes.
chatbotSuggestions: What is your main tech stack?
How did you design the waiting system?

chatbotData.answer: My core stack includes TypeScript, React, Next.js, Node.js, Nest.js, AWS, and SQL. I also work with C#/.NET and Three.js for specialized delivery.
Recent work includes kiosk payment integration, waiting system modernization, and full-stack platform development with real-time capabilities.
I designed a waiting system using Redis atomicity and DB synchronization to ensure consistency, concurrency, and recovery under load.
I delivered measurable improvements such as faster defect resolution and stable multi-surface releases.
I actively leverage AI to improve efficiency and quality while considering safety, cost, and product integration.
I deliver full-stack solutions across web, mobile, kiosk, and admin products, as well as platform engineering and system integrations.
I am open to collaboration when the scope aligns with product impact and technical growth. Please contact me for details.
